title.narrative: COMMUNICATION AND ADVOCACY

description.narrative: By 2021, WCARO will have raised the consciousness of key external audiences on the importance of equitable investments in children and will have created opportunities for supporters and influencers to take action and support the cause of children in West and Central Africa., which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: COMMUNICATION AND PUBLIC ADVOCACY, PARTNERSHIP, RESOURCE MOBILISATION

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, WCARO will have raised the consciousness of key external audiences on the importance of equitable investments in childrenand will have created opportunities for supporters and influencers to take action and support the cause of children in West andCentral Africa.

description.narrative: In 2021, the Communication team focused on:Acceleration of progress towards all Key Results for children by leveraging co-creation with programs and cross-sectoral units also using Global Advocacy Priorities and campaigns as a vehicle to promote regional priorities on the global scene;Formulation and implementation of a Sahel Narrative;Empowering young people as key actors of our advocacy strategy, especially around ;climate change;Increasing brand awareness&supporting Resource Mobilization bydeveloping donor-friendly materials to tell the story of UNICEF in the region;Build capacity at the RO and COs and provide technical as | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/03/2022
